description:
Things go from bad to worse for Rito.  First, he has a bunch of aliens show up, and then he finds that he`s engage to a galactic princess, now the girl he really likes is mad at him? How could things possibly get any worse? Oh, well, having Lala`s father blow up the earth would be pretty bad. Rito has only three days to set things right and prevent King Deviluke`s wrath over a broken engagement?
Source: crunchyroll
